name: Robo Snake LT
description:
Robo Snake is a challenging game for the whole family. You control the five cells Robo Snake on his way to collect the needed food for your base.

You have to pickup the red food stations and bring them back to your base to get one point. But watch for the green enemies. If they hit your Snake than you lose one life. You can get it back if you collect it in the outer space.

If your Robo Snake contains five cells (lifes) than you can fire to destroy the green enemies.

Features:
-Fire function to destroy enemies
-Five cells Robo Snake
-Easy joystick control
-Ideal for all ages
-Space sounds and music
-Universal version for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
